attributes.action: Make all politicians wear clown costumes in parliament for added comedy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to spice up the proceedings at No10 i feel a bit of added comedy would not go a miss. What then would be better than our politicians dressed as clowns as they cheer and jeer at each other.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
